subject: Attn:
body:
Attn: 
My name is Adam Fletcher, Chief inspection agent of United Nations
Inspection Unit at one of the international airports in the United States
here (Undisclosed).
 
We discovered an abandoned shipment from a diplomat and
when scanned it revealed an undisclosed sum of money in the box and your
name and address was tagged on it. The consignment was abandoned because
the contents was not properly declared by the delivery agent as money
rather it was declared as personal effects to avoid diversion by the
shipping agent.
We will have smooth delivery of the consignment to you with
all detailed information that will be needed for claim on your behalf if
you will assure us your readiness to claim the shipment and secure it in
your possession. Sharing and other conditions will be discussed once we
hear from you. You can call me on this number +1281-861-1404. Thank you.
Regards
Adam Fletcher
Chief inspection agent of United Nations

subject: Re:  Attn:
body:
Dear Adam Fletcher,

Thank you for your message. I am surprised to hear about this abandoned shipment tagged with my name and address. I would like to know more details about this situation.

Could you please provide me with more information about the origin of the shipment, the diplomat who was supposed to deliver it, and why it was abandoned? Also, could you clarify what you mean by "secure it in your Sharing"?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Curtis
